description: This is a shell script that provides a command-line interface for managing OCI containers, including starting, stopping, listing, and executing commands inside containers via curl JSON-RPC calls. It defines functions for various container operations and a main loop for user interaction.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container from an OCI bundle directory or tarball, sending a JSON-RPC request via curl.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file, sending a request via curl.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container via a JSON-RPC call.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specific container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container with optional options.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information for the CLI commands.
